objects.description: Monitor for files being encrypted before transfer, temporary storage of encrypted files before exfiltration, or files with unusual extensions indicative of encryption (.aes, .enc, .bin). Analytic 1 - Detecting Encrypted Files Before Exfiltration (EventCode=11 OR EventCode=4663 OR source="/var/log/audit/audit.log" type="open") | where (file_path IN ("/tmp/*", "/var/tmp/*", "/home/*/Downloads/*", "C:\\Users\\*\\Documents\\exfil") AND file_extension IN ("aes", "enc", "bin")) | eval risk_score=case( file_extension="aes" OR file_extension="enc", 9, file_extension="bin", 8 ) | where risk_score >= 8 | stats count by _time, host, user, file_path, file_extension, risk_score
